column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya is a fantastic place for a few number of ramen options. There are a couple appetizers but really
column2: the menu is better geared toward going straight for the main courses. The drink menu has a few house specialties and the bar is stocked to make most basic drinks without many specialty liquors. The waitstaff did not seem to know what options the bar had
column3: they were very friendly and tried to be helpful though.
